bid.desc: 0-7 hcp. Only 7 hcp with flat hand.
16-19(20)hcp. <= 7.5 tricks, 5+c/h OR v. strong NT range (21-22)
Relay, gf. 23+ hcp. If balanced, 27+ hcp.
3 controls, so flat hand, no other values.
Relay. Will determine shape, strength and keycards.
8-11(12) hcp, 5+ hearts, 4-5 spades. (5 spades means exactly 5 hearts.)
6+ spades, requests cue bids with fit.
6+ clubs, requests cue bids with fit.
6+ diamonds, requests cue bids with fit.
6+ hearts, requests cue bids with fit. (Note responder either is balanced or has 5 hearts.)
8+ hcp, 5+ clubs. Unbalanced, not 45 in dc.
8+ hcp, 5+ diamonds. Unbalanced, not 54 in dc.
11-15 hcp, 4+ diamonds. Could have longer clubs.
13-15 points. 4+ spades (probably exactly 4 spades). By implication 5+ diamonds.
13-15 points. Longer clubs than diamonds, so 5+ clubs.
16+ points, longer clubs than diamonds (5+ clubs).
18 points, 4+ hearts. Considers their shortage unimportant.
6+ diamonds, to play. With 3 card diamonds and 9-10 points, responder may bid on.
16+ points, longer clubs than diamonds (5+ clubs). Since there is a known fit, we do not require 17 points, despite responder being bounded.
10-12 hcp, balanced, no 4cM. Values in non-diamond suits if 4 diamonds.
10-12 points, 4+ diamonds. Not ideal for play in NT.
13-15 hcp, balanced. No 4cM. Stops in at least 2 outside suits.
4+ diamonds, gf, slam seeking. Agrees diamonds. Cuebids follow.
11-15 hcp, 4+ hearts. Could have longer clubs.
6+ points, 4+ spades. Could have a longer minor (e.g. 4 spades, 5cm).
13-15 points, 4+ clubs (by implication 5+ hearts). Could be 1444.
6-9 hcp, balanced. 3- in the majors. 3+ clubs. (Not 3352 - 2d/2h).
13-15 hcp. Balanced. 3- in the majors. May be more restrictive than this. (This bid is not preferred).
Swiss raise. 12-15 hcp, no shortage, 4+ spades.
To play. 4+ spades. Could be pre-emptive.
Stayman. This includes invitational balanced hands with no interest in the majors.
To play. (Usually 45 or better in sh with better hearts.)
To play. (Usually 54 or better in sh with better spades.)
Game only, 4 spades. Choice of 3n and 4s.
11-15 hcp, 5+ clubs. If precisely 5 clubs, must have 4 spades.
Multi, weak 2 in a major or 23-24 balanced.
Pass or correct, some interest in hearts.
Weak 2 in hearts, either strong (8-10 hcp) or good suit (2 of top 3 honours).
Weak (5-7 hcp) but good suit (2 of top 3 honours).
Weak 2 in spades, either strong (8-10 hcp) or good suit (2 of top 3 honours).
Weak (5-7 hcp) but good suit (2 of top 3 honours).
Weak 2 in hearts, weak (5-7 hcp) and bad suit (1- of top 3 honours).
Weak 2 in hearts, weak (5-7 hcp) and bad suit (1- of top 3 honours).
5-10 hcp, 55 in spades and a minor.
Transfer to hearts. Is not aiming for immediate RKCB.
Transfer to spades. Is not aiming for immediate RKCB.
Puppet to 3n. Long minor, slam seeking.
45+ dc. Clubs at least as long as diamonds.
0 aces. Any further bid is to play.
